item.description:
Cardio Ballroom NO PARTNER NEEDED!

Wednesdays, February 15, 4:30pm – 5:30pm

Latitudes Methuen, MA. *NO MEMBERSHIP NEEDED!

WALK-INS WELCOME ANYTIME!    Here's your chance to FEEL LIKE A STAR and join me for my newest, most fun class: Cardio Ballroom!   It's like Zumba in that it's a cardio-dance workout with no partner needed but the difference is you learn specific dances and choreography set to some of today's popular music you that know and love and then we put it all together for a "performance" at the end...just like they do on the hit TV Show, Dancing with the Stars!!!!!   You’ll learn the Jumpin' Jive, Cheeky Cha-Cha, the Diva Disco, the Sultry Samba, the Fiery Paso Doble and the Tempting Tango and then we put them all together for one big show-stopping performance at the end of class!   It's a blast and an awesome whole-body workout that will PROVE to you that YOU CAN DANCE no matter what your experience!   NO PARTNER OR EXPERIENCE REQUIRED! OPEN TO THE PUBLIC. Non-Members are welcome to Drop-In just call location for pricing details  More at: www.amyfournier​healthandfitnes​s.com
item.name: NEW CLASS! Cardio Ballroom Wednesdays! (No Partner Required!)
